knimeNode.name: Date/Time Shift
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds a value in a defined granularity to an existing date.

fullDescription.intro: The node shifts a date/time with a defined granularity. The user can select the date reference and the shift value. The date can be chosen as a Date/Time column, as the execution time or as a fixed entered date. The shift value can be achieved by using a numerical column, however, it is also possible to enter a constant shift value. The numerical shift value is added to the selected date. The value is interpreted based on the selected granularity (year, quarter, month, week, day, hour, minute).
